```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)

library(ggplot2)

library(leaflet)
```

```{r data loading, include=FALSE}
coords <- read.csv("dat/info_stations.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r icons, include=FALSE}
water <- makeAwesomeIcon(
  icon = "water-outline",
  markerColor = "blue",
  library = "ion"
)
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Carte

```{r map}
leaflet(data = coords) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(lng = ~Lon,
              lat = ~Lat,
              icon = water,
             popup = ~ID,
             label = ~ID)
```



Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Description

This map features the stations that records precipitations around British Columbia.
